channel.title: awesome on Max' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in awesome on Max' Blog

item.title: Pretty Icons with Fork Awesome
item.description: Fork Awesome is a fully open source fork of font awesome. Check out the icons and get started. I simply added <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/fork-awesome@1.2.0/css/fork-awesome.min.css" integrity="sha256-XoaMnoYC5TH6/+ihMEnospgm0J1PM/nioxbOUdnM8HY=" crossorigin="anonymous"> into the head-section of /themes/m10c/layouts/_default/baseof.html and was ready to start .
